jmf.core

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmf.core.Core
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventDispatcherCore, IFrameworkAccess, IFrameworkController

    public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFrameworkAccess, IFrameworkController, IEventDispatcherCore
    Manages the ZMF execution and the module lifecycle. Connects the module to execute, messaging and peer discovery. Initiates module enabling, disabling or instance stopping. Needs a module reference, a peer discovery service and a messaging service. Also manages module dependency management. Via the interface IZmfInstanceAccess it allows modules to interact with ZMF. Via the interface IZmfInstanceController it allows external control of the ZMF. created on 7/30/15.
    Author:
    Jonas Grunert, Tobias Korb

        Parameters:

        module - Module to be managed by this core
        peerDiscoveryService - Peer discovery service detecting other peers on the ZMF bus
        zmqSrv - ZMQ messaging service for communicating over the ZMF/ZMQ bus

                             boolean peerDiscoveryWait,
                             boolean disableEqualModuleInterconnect)
        Starts this ZMF core
        Parameters:
        moduleAutoEnable - If true tries to enable the module as soon as possible
        exitWhenEnableFail - If true will exit if module enabling fails
        peerDiscoveryWait - If true the peer discovery will wait until all active modules discovered
        disableEqualModuleInterconnect -
        Returns:
        True if starting successful
